name: Introduction to Combinatorics
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of combinatorics, focusing on topics such as counting, generating functions, recurrence relations, and graph theory.

name: Probability Theory
description: This course covers the fundamentals of probability theory, including random variables, distributions, expected values, and conditional probability.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: This course covers the fundamentals of discrete mathematics, including logic, set theory, counting, graph theory, and combinatorics.

name: Advanced Combinatorics
description: This course covers advanced topics in combinatorics, such as generating functions, recurrence relations, and graph theory.
